```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

setwd("thisdir")
source("00.common.import.R")

df <- read.delim("data/readlength.txt",sep="\t")
df <- df[df$length<3050,]

melted = melt(df, id.vars="length")
colnames(melted) <- c("length","flowcell","percentage")

mycolor=c("#f89645","#f89645","#4295cd","#4295cd","#4295cd","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a","#18489a")
#d=data.frame(lt=c("blank", "solid", "dashed", "dotted", 
#                  "dotdash", "longdash", "twodash", "1F", 
#                  "F1", "4C88C488", "12345678"))

pdf("Sup.Fig.S3b.pdf", width=8, height=5, useDingbats=FALSE)
ggplot(data=melted, aes(x=length, y=percentage, colour=flowcell, group=flowcell)) + 
      geom_line(aes(linetype=flowcell, color=flowcell)) +
      theme_minimal() +
      scale_color_manual(values = mycolor) +
      xlab("read length") + 
      ylab("%age of reads")
dev.off()

```
